page.title: 16WOODINGDEAN COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: Woodingdean community centre is the focus for adult leisure activities.It is leased by the community association from East Sussex County Council.The centre is a bungalow built in the 1960s and consists of kitchen,bar, toilets and several large rooms.These have tables,chairs,snooker tables etc. The centre can be hired out for a fee of eg:Â£65 per day.This can to be individuals for wedding receptions, parties etc;or to groups for activities.These currently include bridge,bingo,music,keep fit,ballet, lectures,talks,gardening,coffee morning,jumble sales,discos and barbecues. The Community Centre is supervised by a warden.
